Doki Dreamers × HOLOSTARS English -TEMPUS- “Sweet Love” Collection Available!
item.author: os_pr
item.content:encoded: July 8, 2025, Tokyo, Japan – COVER Corporation (Minato-ku, Tokyo; CEO: Tanigo Motoaki) has announced that the Doki Dreamers × HOLOSTARS English -TEMPUS- “Sweet Love” product collection is available for purchase.The Doki Dreamers × HOLOSTARS English -TEMPUS- “Sweet Love” collection is the first product collaboration project between HOLOSTARS English -TEMPUS- and artist-driven merchandise brand Doki Dreamers. The product collection features a lineup of baking-themed accessories, including a cookie-style button, a chocolate-style keychain, an enamel pin, a collection of “cheki”-style photo cards, and a beautiful poster featuring each of the HOLOSTARS English -TEMPUS- talents. The Doki Dreamers × HOLOSTARS English -TEMPUS- “Sweet Love” collection merchandise is available on the Doki Dreamers online shop from June 20, 2025 from 10:00 AM (PDT), and will be available at ANIME Impulse Orange County in Anaheim, CA on August 30th and 31st, 2025. For more information, please visit the official Doki Dreamers social media accounts and official website.Doki Dreamers × HOLOSTARS English -TEMPUS- “Sweet Love” collection ・ Cookie button pins ・ Photo cards ・ Key Visual posterOnline Shipping Shipping from: Washington State, USAShipping is subject to availability. Orders containing backlogged products may be delayed. Orders may be cancelled any time prior to shipping.Doki Dreamers strives to connect the dreams of creators with the hearts of fans, celebrating their communities and making memories together. Their shop specializes in creating high quality products for VTubers and their communities. Each product is made with the belief that merchandise should be as colorful and unique as the talents themselves, and be a fun way to celebrate and share love for a community.

GHOST X GHOST Teams Up with Mori Calliope Again for a PORTRAIT OF DEATH drop!
item.author: os_pr
item.content:encoded: July 3, 2025, Tokyo, Japan – COVER Corporation (Minato-ku, Tokyo; CEO: Tanigo Motoaki) has announced another collaboration between GHOST X GHOST and Mori Calliope of hololive English of hololive production. Following the success of the previous Metalcropolis collaboration, they will launch a new limited-edition series titled .Taking some inspiration from Alphonse Mucha and the desire to showcase talents in a new way the GHOST X GHOST team have created an unexpected and unique design in the PORTRAIT series. Illustrator Florian Bertmer brings Mori Calliope to life in a design that fuses elegance with ominous grace befit for the reaper’s apprentice.“We’re stoked to work with Calli again, and we hope you’re ready to face her PORTRAIT OF DEATH.” the GHOST X GHOST team shared.The Mori Calliope – Portrait of Death series includesLong-Sleeve T-Shirt – $45 Printed on Comfort Colors “pepper” long-sleeved t-shirt and features printed sleeves.White Variant T-Shirt – $30 Available for PREORDER for 24-hours only! Features metallic silver ink.Standard & Long-Sleeve T-Shirts: Pre-orders open Tuesday, July 2nd at 5 PM PDT and close Friday, July 25th at 12 PM PDT. Extremely limited—preorders are available only for 24 hours! From July 2nd at 5 PM PDT to July 3rd at 5 PM PDT.Whether you’re a fan of Mori Calliope or love art and fashion, don’t miss the series—check it out now!

item.title: hololive English Teams Up with Kura Sushi USA for an Exclusive Summer Collaboration! - ホロライブプロダクション
HOLOSTARS English to Host a Welcome Giveaway Campaign in Celebration of New Social Media Accounts!
item.author: narita
item.content:encoded: COVER Corporation (Minato-ku, Tokyo; CEO: Tanigo Motoaki) has announced a HOLOSTARS English Welcome Giveaway campaign in celebration of two new official social media accounts.The followers’ welcoming giveaway, taking place on X, Instagram, and TikTok, will last from July 1st until July 23rd JST, with a total of 30 winners across the three campaigns.Nine of these lucky winners will be eligible to receive three 3D Acrylic Stands of their choice from HOLOSTARS English -TEMPUS- or HOLOSTARS English -ARMIS-, while 21 winners will be eligible to receive one holoEmblem Pin Badge of their choice, also from HOLOSTARS English -TEMPUS- or HOLOSTARS English -ARMIS-.HOLOSTARS English Welcome Giveaway July 1st 10:00AM – July 23rd at 1:00PM JST 30 winners across 3 social media platforms will be contacted on July 25th at 12:00PM JST.*Followers must participate with a public account that can accept private messages for a chance to win. – The user must be following the official HOLOSTARS English X account. – The user must give the giveaway post a Like. – The user must give the giveaway post a Repost. 3D Acrylic Stands of the Winner’s Choice (Qty:3) : 3 winners holoEmblem Pin Badge of the Winner’s Choice (Qty:1) : 7 winners – The user must be following the official HOLOSTARS English Instagram account. – The user must give the giveaway post a Like. – The user must comment on the giveaway post with three oshimarks of their favorite talents. 3D Acrylic Stands of the Winner’s Choice (Qty:3) : 3 winners holoEmblem Pin Badge of the Winner’s Choice (Qty:1) : 7 winners – The user must be following the official HOLOSTARS English X account. – The user must give the giveaway post a Like. – The user must comment on the giveaway post with three oshimarks of their favorite talents. 3D Acrylic Stands of the Winner’s Choice (Qty:3) : 3 winners holoEmblem Pin Badge of the Winner’s Choice (Qty:1) : 7 winners

item.title: hololive English Teams Up with Kura Sushi USA for an Exclusive Summer Collaboration! | NEWS | hololive official website - hololive.hololivepro.com
hololive English Teams Up with Kura Sushi USA for an Exclusive Summer Collaboration!
item.author: os_pr
item.content:encoded: July 2, 2025, Tokyo, Japan – COVER Corporation (Minato-ku, Tokyo; CEO: Tanigo Motoaki) has announced that hololive English of hololive production is collaborating with Kura Sushi USA. The exclusive campaign is running from July 1st until July 31st, 2025.hololive English × Kura Sushi: Exclusive Collab Experience Across the U.S.!A limited-time campaign is rolling out at Kura Sushi locations across the U.S. from July 1st to 31st, featuring three hololive English talents — , , and ! Don’t miss out on this exciting experience, with specially crafted menu items and immersive in-store elements designed for fans and food enthusiasts alike.Kura Sushi USA x hololive English Exclusive Sushi DishesEnjoy three original dishes inspired by Ninomae Ina’nis, Ouro Kronii, and Gigi Murin! is honored with the Spicy Crunchy Squid, featuring squid tempura topped with spicy mayo, eel sauce, and bonito flakes over Kura’s specialty sushi rice. influence comes to life in the Tuna with Avocado Cream Cheese, which pairs soy-marinated tuna with avocado and cream cheese over Kura’s specialty sushi rice. is represented by the vibrant Salmon & Tamago Spicy Roll, made with spicy salmon and tamago atop a shrimp mayo roll finished with panko crunchy flakes.Exclusive hololive English × Kura Sushi USA Goods to Complement the Culinary Experience!Kura Sushi USA x hololive English bottle set Available starting July 1st, 2025 for , while supplies last.*1 design in total; limited to three per party. Available for purchase in-restaurant only.Kura Sushi USA x hololive English cooling towel and carrying case set Available from July 21st with a minimum spend of in-store at participating locations, while supplies last.*1 design in total; limited to three per party.Get Immersed in the Summer Festivities at hololive English Themed Stores!Participating Kura Sushi USA locations will feature hololive English themed in-store decorations throughout the duration of the promotion, transforming the dining experience into a fully immersive, fan-centric celebration.“We’re incredibly excited to partner with hololive English for our first U.S.-based VTuber collaboration,” said , President and CEO of Kura Sushi USA, Inc. “This campaign offers a one-of-a-kind experience that blends fan culture with Kura’s passion for innovation and fun.”About Kura Sushi USA, Inc.Kura Sushi USA, Inc. is a technology-enabled Japanese restaurant concept with over 76 locations across the United States. Known for its revolving sushi bar experience and commitment to quality ingredients, Kura Sushi USA is a subsidiary of Kura Sushi, Inc., which has operated in Japan for over 45 years since 1977.

hololive Gen 0 Octopus Card Pre-Sale!
item.author: os_pr
item.content:encoded: COVER Corporation has officially announced an extended collaboration between hololive production and Octopus Card, unveiling a series of exclusive physical Octopus card-sets featuring the beloved talents of hololive Gen 0. Pre-orders for this special edition are now available at: https://pump-water.com/product-category/hololiveThe hololive Gen 0 Octopus Card set is available in two editions: a and a , perfect for both practical users and passionate collectors. Showcasing Gen 0 members in classic Hong Kong-style outfits, take them along as you wander the streets, savour local delicacies, and make them part of your everyday life!Special Edition Octopus Single Card SetSet Includes: ・ hololive Gen 0 Special Edition Octopus Card ・ Octopus Card Holder with Lanyard*Designs under supervisionSpecial Edition Octopus Collector SetSet Includes: ・ hololive Gen 0 Special Edition Octopus Card ・ Magnetic Octopus Card Holder ・ Card Display Stand ・ Acrylic Shikishi Artboard ・ Gift Box PackagingPre-order your exclusive Octopus Card to take Gen 0 talents with you wherever you go! The products will be available for purchase on Pump-Water.com, the platform dedicated to licensed anime merchandise. *Designs under supervisionOctopus is a contactless stored value card that provides customers with a simple, safe, and secure way to pay. First launched in 1997 across public transport systems, the applications of the Octopus card have since expanded to include retail stores and various facilities, making everyday life more convenient.

item.title: Brace Yourself Games x hololive Collaboration: hololive DLC Pack Comes to Rift of the NecroDancer! | NEWS | hololive official website - hololive.hololivepro.com
Brace Yourself Games x hololive Collaboration: hololive DLC Pack Comes to Rift of the NecroDancer!
item.author: os_pr
item.content:encoded: June 25, 2025 – COVER Corporation (Minato-ku, Tokyo; CEO: Tanigo Motoaki) has announced a collaboration between Brace Yourself Games and hololive production. An all-new downloadable content (DLC) pack featuring hololive talents will be added to Rift of the NecroDancer, the game. The collaboration will launch simultaneously on Steam and Nintendo Switch on June 25th.Players will be able to sync the beat to five brand-new tracks featuring from hololive talents – including the graduated Gawr Gura. As a special promotion for this exciting crossover, the track “REFLECT” by Gawr Gura will be available to all Rift of the NecroDancer players to download for free.The full lineup of songs in the hololive Music Pack includes: ・ “REFLECT” by Gawr Gura (Free to download!) ・ “BIBBIDIBA” by Hoshimachi Suisei ・ “Ahoy!! 我ら宝鐘海賊団☆” by Houshou Marine ・ “Play Dice!” by Hakos Baelz ・ “Carbonated Love” by IRySEach song will be available for individual purchase at $1.99 USD, or fans can grab the entire collection as a bundle for a 25% discount. We hope you enjoy it! The hololive DLC drops on Steam and Nintendo Switch on June 25th.

hololive English -Justice- Announces 3D Showcase Schedule!
item.author: os_pr
item.content:encoded: June 16, 2025, Tokyo, JAPAN – COVER Corporation (Minato-ku, Tokyo, Japan, CEO: Motoaki Tanigo) today announced the hololive English -Justice-’s 3D Showcase Schedule, kicking off with Elizabeth Rose Bloodflame on August 1st, Gigi Murin on August 2nd, Cecilia Immergreen on August 8th, Raora Panthera on August 9th, and a 3D Collaboration on August 16th. (PDT)hololive English -Justice- talents Elizabeth Rose Bloodflame, Gigi Murin, Cecilia Immergreen, and Raora Panthera will star in their individual 3D Showcases, followed by a 3D Collaboration livestream together.The 3D showcases for hololive English -Justice- members and their collaboration stream will feature various contents and performances from each of the talents. The four talents will also be joining their fellow hololive English members in the upcoming hololive English 3rd Concert -All for One- event, announced to be happening later in August. hololive English -Justice- 3D Showcase

item.title: COVER Corporation Announces hololive English 3rd Concert -All for One-!
item.author: os_pr
item.content:encoded: June 16, 2025, Tokyo, JAPAN – COVER Corporation (Minato-ku, Tokyo; CEO: Tanigo Motoaki) has announced that hololive English will be holding their third concert event, hololive English 3rd Concert -All for One-, on August 23rd and 24th at the Radio City Music Hall in New York, NY, over the span of two days.The concert will feature the members of hololive English, including members of hololive English -Justice-, who will be debuting in 3D before the performance during the month of August 2025. More details regarding their upcoming 3D debuts can be found here.“Our staff have been working hard to make this concert even more enjoyable than previous ones, so please look forward to it! If you can’t make it there, we hope you will tune in via livestreaming,” commented Motoaki Tanigo, CEO, COVER Corporation.Additional updates will be shared through hololive English’s official social media channels, so be sure to follow them!hololive English 3rd Concert -All for One- Overviewhololive English 3rd Concert -All for One- Organized by: COVER Corporation / hololive production #holoAllforOne #hololiveEN Day 1 Saturday, August 23rd, 2025 (EDT) Doors open at 4:00 PM / Streaming starts at 5:30 PM / Event starts at 6:00 PM Sunday, August 24th, 2025 (EDT) Doors open at 4:00 PM / Streaming starts at 5:30 PM / Event starts at 6:00 PM Radio City Music Hall New York, NY United States Mori Calliope / Takanashi Kiara / Ninomae Ina’nis / IRyS / Ouro Kronii / Hakos Baelz / Shiori Novella / Koseki Bijou / Nerissa Ravencroft / Fuwawa Abyssgard / Mococo Abyssgard / Elizabeth Rose Bloodflame / Gigi Murin / Cecilia Immergreen / Raora PantheraENUE TICKETS (RADIO CITY MUSIC HALL)FRONT ORCHESTRA/FRONT 1st MEZZANINE: $160 USD MIDDLE ORCHESTRA/SIDE 1st MEZZANINE: $150 USD REAR ORCHESTRA/REAR 1st MEZZANINE/FRONT 2nd MEZZANINE: $135 USD REAR 2nd MEZZANINE/REAR 3rd MEZZANINE: $95 USD1-DAY Streaming Ticket (Aug 23rd EDT) 1-DAY Streaming Ticket (Aug 24th EDT)
